titles.title: Small Business Artificial Intelligence Training Act of 2024
Small Business Artificial Intelligence Training and Toolkit Act of 2024
Small Business Artificial Intelligence Training Act of 2024
A bill to require the Secretary of Commerce to develop artificial intelligence training resources and toolkits for United States small businesses, and for other purposes.
